metadata.title: CVE-2019-20198 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in ezXML 0.8.3 through 0.8.6. The functionezxml_ent_ok() mishandles recursion, leading to stack consumption for acrafted XML file.

criterions.comment: mapcache: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
scilab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
